name: RandomItemGen
description:
Generate some items

Wanted to make some basic UI and systems that could be used in RPG games as an exercise, there's no real gameplay here.

Current Features:

Movable and resortable UI panels

Random Items with various random qualities and attributes, including affixed names

Inventory and Equipment slots with drag and drop and right click equip and unequip support

Talent system with different trees, restrictions based on total points spent or pre-requisite talent

Body system with dynamic UI display, body parts have limb index system that enable limbs to realistically be lost (if elbow is severed, lose fore arm and hand, etc)
